amendment.description: To designate certain National Forest System land in the State of Vermont for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation system and designate a National Recreation Area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5019 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5019 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S9732-9733; text: CR S9732-9733) To designate certain National Forest System land in the State of Vermont for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation system and designate a National Recreation Area.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5019 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5019 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
